div.p: Lorissa qualified individually in all four events and will compete in the all-around competition Lorissa Received a 1st in All-around, Balance Beam, Floor Routine, and 2nd in Vault.
Barneveld School District Board Meeting April 15, 2020. Meeting Video
Barneveld High School is proud to announce the Valedictorian and Salutatorian for the graduating class of 2020. Karley Moore has been named Valedictorian and Kaylene Doescher as the Salutatorian....
This year has certainly been a wild ride and our teachers have been a solid force. The PTO wants to help recognize our teachers for all their efforts this year but we know you as parents, and...

The Barneveld School District would like the Class of 2020 to know that we see you and will celebrate you. Please watch the district social media pages for Honoring Our Seniors posts. #BeBarneveld view image

The Barneveld School Board is excited to welcome Joe Price as the next district administrator, starting July 1, 2020. The Board officially approved his appointment at the April 15th School Board meeting.
We believe Mr. Price's experience in leading small districts, strong background in finance, passion for culture and communication, reputation as a progressive leader, commitment to community, and students-first approach will bring value and growth to our students and staff.
Mr. Price earned his Superintendent Certification from Cardinal Stritch University - Milwaukee, WI and his Master of Arts in Educational Leadership from National Louis University in Elgin, Il.
We look forward to introducing Mr. Price to the students, staff and community of the Barneveld School District.
Thank you, Barneveld School Board view image

The Barneveld School District would like the Class of 2020 to know that we see you and will celebrate you. Please watch the district social media pages for Honoring Our Seniors posts. #BeBarneveld view image
